about_the_game:
lone.AI is an upcoming space RPG roguelite. With challenging, relentless gameplay, each run has the potential to boost your ship's power, speed, and more. As a lone AI, fight your way through the solar system and uncover the secret behind the ZOSMA, an alien race that holds power over the system.

Fight!

Shortly after undocking, be ready to defend yourself against a relentless onslaught of enemies.

Upgrade

Obtain upgrades from various locations and level up to advance your progress with each run.

Abilities and Modules

Harness abilities and discover modules that alter the way you fight back.

Cargo

Collect various cargo to trade, sell, or utilize for upgrades.

More Features included in lone.AI

-Hundreds of unique builds to suit various playstyles.

-Explore the solar system to discover hidden locations, different types of shops, and more.

-Visit different planets to complete missions and interact with various alien species.

-Acquire a high bounty that attracts dangerous bounty hunters.

-Gameplay that poses many challenges.

-Compete to reach the top of the leaderboards.

Planned Features

-Controller Support

-Steam Achievements

-Steam Cloud

lone.AI is easy to learn but hard to master. Upon undocking, you commence with a basic AI ship. Soon, enemies attack from every direction, prompting you to defend yourself to survive and acquire loot. Loot includes credits, cargo, modules, and more. Utilize credits and cargo to trade or purchase more upgrades for your ship. Some upgrades are temporary for the current run, while others are permanent and persist across all runs. Modules offer specific effects but only last for the duration of the run.

A run concludes upon either defeat, or victory against the boss, the alien mothership appearing at the end of your run time of 1000. Upon defeat, you can submit your high scores and start anew with any newly acquired upgrades. Victory against the boss grants you triumph. Post-victory, the game intensifies in various ways, potentially unlocking new upgrades to aid you against heightened challenges. With increased difficulty comes the opportunity for higher scores, propelling you to compete for the top spot on the leaderboards.
